dd538207-ef3c-42e0-9b85-a29d31a60962.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of Administrator are very managerial and participative. They are tactful and assertive while helping others grow and develop. Admins have a strong desire to fix what is broken and be the example to follow. They are proficient at delegating tasks and ensuring completion of them.
dd538207-ef3c-42e0-9b85-a29d31a60962.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

8bbd5909-8aaa-47e7-a997-145c57578449.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of Assistant are team players and willing to help others. They are accurate, friendly and tend to be realistic service providers. Assistants serve others they believe in while maintaining proper allegiances.
8bbd5909-8aaa-47e7-a997-145c57578449.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Assistant

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

6a8a7f54-e669-4de4-82e5-41b609afe116.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of Dominator follow their own path and actively seek new projects and challenges. They offer new and innovative solutions in order to make progress. Dominators also tend to meet their own needs in their own way.
6a8a7f54-e669-4de4-82e5-41b609afe116.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Dominator

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

e4cf2428-f623-4644-84f5-c9019e97f592.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of Harmonizer are adept at solving people problems. They bring stability to group efforts with predictable actions and good listening skills. Harmonizers also want to be viewed as warm and open by others, and they strive to build personal connections.
e4cf2428-f623-4644-84f5-c9019e97f592.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Harmonizer

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

bf5c5cbb-4a51-4d10-9d06-d9772658501f.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of Influencers have many personal contacts who support their efforts. They are ideal for promoting, gaining attention and generating positive energy for their ideas and projects. Influencers also strive to gain approval, popularity and recognition, and are willing to accept and include others as well.
bf5c5cbb-4a51-4d10-9d06-d9772658501f.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Influencer

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

40624b05-10da-46a2-9263-3baaf2b4d7d5.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of Investigator lead by example and are thorough, hard-driving, logical and non-emotional in work environments. They are driven by the need to be correct and are very task oriented. Investigators also strive to complete important tasks accurately.
40624b05-10da-46a2-9263-3baaf2b4d7d5.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Investigator

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

30b7921d-935e-47cd-a326-59b076c29033.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of Machine initiate their plans and adjust their tactics when necessary. They have a desire for achieving results and a competing desire for the their results to be perfect. They also seek dominance while reaching unique goals.
30b7921d-935e-47cd-a326-59b076c29033.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Machine

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

29f0dc0d-5c0a-430c-b114-954fcfa8aad0.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of Negotiator are focused on doing things right and replicating past successes. They are able to teach others, display confidence and strive to do better. Negotiators are also driven by the need to be practical, excel at what they do and are viewed as being assertive.
29f0dc0d-5c0a-430c-b114-954fcfa8aad0.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Negotiator

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

f372ac69-094f-4432-a92d-442cda05d421.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of Objective Thinker have highly developed quality control and critical thinking ability. They're focused on getting the facts, reviewing findings and bringing analytical clarity to projects. Objective Thinkers strive for safety and accomplishment through correctness and avoid unsafe or risky ideas or relationships.
f372ac69-094f-4432-a92d-442cda05d421.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Objective Thinker

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

fa545ca6-b632-4fd1-82ac-4b82997270ba.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style have a strong sense of personal accountability. They are industrious and diligent, and they strive for personal accomplishment and results.
fa545ca6-b632-4fd1-82ac-4b82997270ba.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Pacesetter

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

9c6316e3-3a0c-4ec6-a7de-7ebcaaa65b21.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of Persuader enjoy working with others. They're good at promoting ideas and concepts and tend to be poised and confident. Persuaders are also adept at making requests of others to get things accomplished, and demonstrate vibrancy, enthusiasm and openness to connect with others. They also seek authority and prestige.
9c6316e3-3a0c-4ec6-a7de-7ebcaaa65b21.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Persuader

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

247e9554-51d5-45ae-a19e-0b608f452358.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of Practitioner seek projects in their area(s) of expertise. They are skilled problem-solvers and experts in identifying solutions. They strive to be current and have high expectations for their own growth and advancement. They avoid being too predictable and want to be recognized for their contributions.
247e9554-51d5-45ae-a19e-0b608f452358.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

eed24b7e-0753-4303-aa7d-bcb752b79607.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of Relater are able to balance interpersonal connections with goals and objectives. They are supportive and team-oriented, and they blend well with others. Relaters respond to praise and they seek acceptance and appreciation by others. They also avoid conflict, anger and disharmony.
eed24b7e-0753-4303-aa7d-bcb752b79607.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Relater

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

31e76f5d-17a8-456b-9c08-2a5ed42c4a56.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of Stabilizer blend well with others, and their reliable and consistent efforts can be counted on. Stabilizers bring balance, temperance and composure to interactions. They also strive for retention of the status quo with minimum disruptive change.
31e76f5d-17a8-456b-9c08-2a5ed42c4a56.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Stabilizer

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

09763bc1-cf12-4efb-a1b5-73da0390da9e.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of Standard Bearer are steady, objective and analytical. They bring a fact-based grounding to a team combined with the ability to work individually or with others effectively. Standard bearers also strive to gain authority from identified organization structures and positions.
09763bc1-cf12-4efb-a1b5-73da0390da9e.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Standard Bearer

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

f05e8491-a9f7-4344-a382-0133321d6b86.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of Strategic Planner apply creative focus to practical, workable concepts and make them doable. They have a strong desire to look good to others and they strive to win, and win with style.
f05e8491-a9f7-4344-a382-0133321d6b86.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Strategic Planner

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

c869c5a9-0300-47ce-b4c6-f292f3e7fd43.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of True Believer avoid conflict and always look for positive signals in the world and in people. They hold the fort and rarely make unnecessary waves. True Believers also fear being misled and can be preoccupied with improving their personal position in groups. They avoid being disliked, failing or being too extreme.
c869c5a9-0300-47ce-b4c6-f292f3e7fd43.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: True Believer

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

5d866a20-e636-43f5-890d-7050852b6e8f.description: Badge earners with a Behavioral Style of Visionary are "movers and shakers" and often attempt to adjust or modify the thoughts and actions of others. They are self-sufficient and don't need attention or affirmation from others. Visionaries also strive to gain control over circumstances, outcomes and other people, and they fear being taken advantage of or losing social status in groups.
5d866a20-e636-43f5-890d-7050852b6e8f.name: SalesCred Behavioral Style: Visionary

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the HumanAccumen Behavioral Assessment.

376a00c9-0852-4cd4-8232-247b2719194a.description: Badge earners with a Challenger Style of Challenger always have a different view of the world and they strive for a deeper understanding of the customer’s business. They're assertive, love to debate and push customers out of their comfort zone. They are not afraid to share their views even when they're potentially controversial.
376a00c9-0852-4cd4-8232-247b2719194a.name: SalesCred Challenger Style: Challenger

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the SalesFuel Sales Acumen assessment.

c256093f-5b14-4c90-adc7-3c3a76c9925c.description: Badge earners with a Challenger Style of Lone Wolf follow their own instincts and they’re self-assured. They’re also very independent and can be challenging to control. They like to do things "their way" instead of adhering to rules and established processes.
c256093f-5b14-4c90-adc7-3c3a76c9925c.name: SalesCred Challenger Style: Lone Wolf

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the SalesFuel Sales Acumen assessment.

ba6eaf17-d443-4cb6-985d-fca836fa373f.description: Badge earners with a Challenger Style of Problem Solver make sure all of their client’s problems are solved. They focus on post-sale follow-up ensuring product implementation and execution steps are completed. Problem Solvers may excel more at customer service than actual sales, and they're very detail-oriented.
ba6eaf17-d443-4cb6-985d-fca836fa373f.name: SalesCred Challenger Style: Problem Solver

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the SalesFuel Sales Acumen assessment.

bc42c687-bd2e-43bd-ae3a-2e96413876d3.description: Badge earners with a Challenger Style of Relationship Builder develop and nurture strong personal and professional relationships across the customer organization. They're generous with their time and work hard to ensure their customer's needs are met, generating customer loyalty in the process.
bc42c687-bd2e-43bd-ae3a-2e96413876d3.name: SalesCred Challenger Style: Relationship Builder

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the SalesFuel Sales Acumen assessment.

c4e59624-2960-4587-8ddf-36a17109ebb8.description: Credible Communication badge earners recognize how they communicate has a direct impact on their credibility with buyers. They appreciate the importance of matching their level of professionalism with each buyer. They also know how email helps them build credibility based on the message they send and how they respond to email inquiries. Plus they understand the importance of meeting preparation, their appearance and how their interaction plays an important role when demonstrating SalesCred.
c4e59624-2960-4587-8ddf-36a17109ebb8.name: SalesCred Training: Credible Communication

alignments.name: Earn a passing knowledge check score of 75% or greater.

Complete the Credible Communication knowledge check.

5b0408c7-febc-44a2-a70d-55f83995d610.description: Online Credibility badge earners know based on what buyers find online, they don’t have a second chance to make a first impression. They recognize how their LinkedIn profiles play a key role when buyers qualify sellers. They also understand how the quality of their writing builds credibility, and how to address negative social media content that may compromise their credibility.
5b0408c7-febc-44a2-a70d-55f83995d610.name: SalesCred Training: Online Credibility

b607e894-63d7-4c9d-949a-2c5204a357b7.description: Referrals+Recommendations badge earners understand what clients say about them is the pinnacle of achieving SalesCred. They recognize the value of others doing the talking for them, and how to stand out from other salespeople with client referrals and testimonials. They know empathy builds credibility with buyers and the importance of consistently nurturing and maintaining their SalesCred. They also understand of the value of reciprocity when someone makes someone else credible.
b607e894-63d7-4c9d-949a-2c5204a357b7.name: SalesCred Training: Referrals+Recommendations

a630e24c-2710-4f87-a7cf-fb545f5bb6d3.description: Relevant Value badge earners know the two most important things buyers want and how their value is perceived from a prospect’s perspective. They know what to say and what to not say when communicating with buyers, and they recognize the importance of sharing credible information. And they understand how discovery questions can build (or hurt) their sales credibility with buyers and why their company’s products aren’t the real solution to focus on.
a630e24c-2710-4f87-a7cf-fb545f5bb6d3.name: SalesCred Training: Relevant Value

1deac3a6-c0a1-42f6-850b-e56af25cb4aa.description: Reliability+Results badge earners know how to build credibility with What They Do, and they understand the importance of producing positive business outcomes for clients. They ‘walk the talk’ and focus on action to help buyers achieve their business goals over their own sales goals. They recognize the need for consistent follow-through with new clients and understand What They Say and What They Do must be in alignment.
1deac3a6-c0a1-42f6-850b-e56af25cb4aa.name: SalesCred Training: Reliability+Results

ab91fa9c-4776-4a47-b19a-969d5d5fd681.description: Research+Preparation badge earners know how to leverage seven key types of pre-call intelligence to be perceived as credible by prospects. They recognize the advantage they have over competitors by knowing the prospect’s company, contacts, customers and use case of their products. They also acknowledge the worth of category research including which companies to target and developing intelligent discovery questions.
ab91fa9c-4776-4a47-b19a-969d5d5fd681.name: SalesCred Training: Research+Preparation

a3a91a6e-758b-4967-8abf-9b2f3d1cd518.description: The holder of this badge has dedicated 10 Years of Service to SalesFuel Inc. Employees earning this prestigious badge have continually demonstrated their expertise, creativity and integrity throughout their employment at SalesFuel. Their professionalism and leadership inspires everyone at SalesFuel to give their best, and their contributions play a vital role in the company’s current and future success.
a3a91a6e-758b-4967-8abf-9b2f3d1cd518.name: SalesFuel 10 Years of Service
